issue.title: [Docs] command to build a wheel is not properly rendered
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1128](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1128). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Built the python documentation and got the following error. This command is not rendered into the output. 

```Java
WARNING: /home/sekikn/repos/arrow/python/doc/source/development.rst:176: (ERROR/3) Error in "code-block" directive:
maximum 1 argument(s) allowed, 10 supplied.

.. code-block:: shell
   python setup.py build_ext --build-type=$ARROW_BUILD_TYPE \
          --with-parquet --with-jemalloc --bundle-arrow-cpp bdist_wheel
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1128?focusedCommentId=16054231) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Need an extra blank line after the directive

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1128?focusedCommentId=16054238) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 762
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/762>
